Is it true that the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is a centralized marketplace controlled by a single entity?

No, the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is not a centralized marketplace. It's a decentralized marketplace where you can buy and sell VerusIDs and NFTs on-chain, execute transactions peer-to-peer without intermediaries, and still have the option to share proceeds with value-added agents or other participants if desired.

Our next step is the testnet rollout of the Ethereum bridge, and after a few days of that proving out in final testing and review, we will deploy it on mainnet as soon as we believe it is ready for permanent use.
